XMLDocument:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-16" standalone="no" ?>

      </Points>
      <Cells>
        <DataArray Name="connectivity" format="ascii" type="UInt32"> 0  1  3  2  4  5  7  6  8  9  11  10  12  13  15  14  16  17  19  18  20  21  23  22  24  25  27  26  28  29  31  30  32  33  35  34  36  37  39  38  40  41  43  42  44  45  47  46  48  49  51  50  52  53  55  54  56  57  59  58  60  61  63  62  64  65  67  66  68  69  71  70  72  73  75  74  76  77  79  78  80  81  83  82  84  85  87  86  88  89  91  90  92  93  95  94  96  97  99  98  100  101  103  102  104  105  107  106  108  109  111  110  112  113  115  114  116  117  119  118  120  121  123  122  124  125  127  126  128  129  131  130  132  133  135  134  136  137  139  138  140  141  143  142  144  145  147  146  148  149  151  150  152  153  155  154  156  157  159  158  160  161  163  162  164  165  167  166  168  169  171  170  172  173  175  174  176  177  179  178  180  181  183  182  184  185  187  186  188  189  191  190  192  193  195  194  196  197  199  198  200  201  203  202  204  205  207  206  208  209  211  210  212  213  215  214 </DataArray>
        <DataArray Name="offsets" format="ascii" type="UInt32"> 8  16  24  32  40  48  56  64  72  80  88  96  104  112  120  128  136  144  152  160  168  176  184  192  200  208  216 </DataArray>
        <DataArray Name="types" format="ascii" type="UInt8"> 12  12  12  12  12  12  12  12  12  12  12  12  12  12  12  12  12  12  12  12  12  12  12  12  12  12  12 </DataArray>
      </Cells>
      <PointData>
        <DataArray Name="chess board" NumberOfComponents="1" format="ascii" type="Float64"> 1.000000000000000e+00  -1.000000000000000e+00  1.000000000000000e+00  -1.000000000000000e+00  1.000000000000000e+00  -1.000000000000000e+00  1.000000000000000e+00  -1.000000000000000e+00  1.000000000000000e+00  -1.000000000000000e+00  1.000000000000000e+00  -1.000000000000000e+00  1.000000000000000e+00  -1.000000000000000e+00  1.000000000000000e+00  -1.000000000000000e+00  1.000000000000000e+00  -1.000000000000000e+00  1.000000000000000e+00  -1.000000000000000e+00  1.000000000000000e+00  -1.000000000000000e+00  1.000000000000000e+00  -1.000000000000000e+00  1.000000000000000e+00  -1.000000000000000e+00  1.000000000000000e+00 </DataArray>
      </PointData>
      <CellData Scalars="chess board "/>
    </Piece>
  </UnstructuredGrid>

</VTKFile>
